description: Note: A valid appeal must be submitted within 12 weeks after the original Decision Date.
name: Decision Date eligibility check

elements.name: Eligible Decision Date allows progress

steps.name: a Decision Date is requested
an eligible Decision Date is provided
progress is made to the Local Planning Department eligibility question

elements.name: Ineligible Decision Date continues to Decision Date Passed page and allows returning to the Decision Date page

steps.name: a Decision Date is requested
an ineligible Decision Date is provided
progress is halted with a message that the Decision Date is ineligible because it is beyond the deadline for an appeal
the re-enter the decision date link is clicked
progress is made to the Decision Date question
